body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install expect
...
configure: error: could not find source file 'pty_.c'
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1827-dcd514c321
* **Python:** 3.8.6
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-ivybridge

### Additional information

* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5497786/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5497788/spack-build-env.txt)

Seems related to http://expect.sourceforge.net/FAQ.html#q42

Don't see any special hacks in https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/master/Formula/expect.rb

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: expect
